## 15 (1.2.5) — Initial Release

<en-US>
Welcome to BossUp! Your personal assistant for building better relationships with your boss.

• Track interactions, feedback, and achievements with timeline entries
• Maintain detailed boss profiles with custom fields
• Get personalized advice from AI-powered chat assistant
• Stay on top of important follow-ups with smart notifications
• Sign in securely with Apple, Google, or email
• Cross-platform support with automatic data sync

Thank you for choosing BossUp!
</en-US>
